results.t: Create new possibilities with Pearson. Start learning today.
results.p: Shop our online store for online courses, eTexts, textbooks, learning platforms, rental books and so much more.
Pearson Education, known since 2011 as simply Pearson, is the educational publishing and services subsidiary of the international corporation Pearson plc.
We are the world's lifelong learning company, serving customers in nearly 200 countries with digital content, assessments, qualifications, and data.
World-class assessments, digital services, and learning resources. Shop International Schools. Books, etextbooks, study tools and much more.
Innovative learning solutions created in collaboration with Canadian educators, with an emphasis on pedagogy, efficacy and best-in-class content.
Big Ideas of Early Mathematics: What Teachers of Young Children Need to Know (Practical Resources in ECE) by Pearson Education
